overview: Nora witnesses the slaughter of her farm lamb, seeing their bond ripped from her arms and served on a platter. She is forced to eat under her grandparents and adapt to their lifestyle. Soon, their home takes a dark turn as Nora sleepwalks to her fridge, lured by the lamb's spirit. She embraces the darkness of its flesh and takes on the role of a child savior. A twisted tale of veganism and coming of age.
title: Sentient
